akn:subsection.akn:heading: Submission by Federal officer; approval of Attorney General; contents

akn:content.akn:p: (a) Submission by Federal officer; approval of Attorney General; contents Each application for an order approving a physical search under this subchapter shall be made by a Federal officer in writing upon oath or affirmation to a judge of the Foreign Intelligence Surveillance Court. Each application shall require the approval of the Attorney General based upon the Attorney General’s finding that it satisfies the criteria and requirements for such application as set forth in this subchapter. Each application shall include—
(b) Additional affidavits or certifications The Attorney General may require any other affidavit or certification from any other officer in connection with the application.
(c) Additional information The judge may require the applicant to furnish such other information as may be necessary to make the determinations required by section 1824 of this title.
